destination.Name: New York City, USA
destination.FunFact: It was briefly the capital of the United States from 1785 to 1790.

destination.Name: Santorini, Greece
destination.FunFact: The island is still an active volcano, though the last major eruption was in 1950.

destination.Name: Hanoi, Vietnam
destination.FunFact: The Old Quarter's streets are named after the goods that were historically sold there.

destination.Name: The Serengeti, Tanzania
destination.FunFact: The Great Migration sees over 1.5 million wildebeest move across the plains.

destination.Name: London, UK
destination.FunFact: Big Ben is the name of the bell, not the clock tower itself (which is the Elizabeth Tower).

destination.Name: Dubai, UAE
destination.FunFact: It has the world's longest automated metro network.
